name: treering_time_bot
description: Simple message broker to enable Slack to TreeRing Time communication using bot

TR_CLIENT_ID.description: Consumer key of your TreeRing Time Connected App

TR_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Consumer secret of your TreeRing Time Connected App

TR_USER_NAME.description: Salesforce username for your integration user

TR_PASSWORD.description: Salesforce password for your integration user

SLACK_ACCOUNT_TOKEN.description: Slack token for the account slash command
